name: sogginess
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of food) the state or quality of being unpleasantly wet: Toss the salad when you’re ready to serve to prevent sogginess. While she wasn't a huge fan of the sogginess of the aubergine, the pasta was excellent. See
soggy
More examplesFewer examplesShe grabs the napkin on which her cafe latte rests, ignores its sogginess and blows her nose.Dry roast all the cereal in a large wok to remove any sogginess.I’ve solved the sogginess issue by adding a layer of breadcrumbs in between each layer of tomatoes.
